upgrade.elementals.waterBubble.descripti: A basic move allowing you to transport water or attack enemies.
upgrade.elementals.waterHelmet.descripti: By making an air pocket with your water bending, you can allow yourself to breathe underwater just like a fish.
Stay underwater for up to 2 minutes.
upgrade.elementals.waterHelmetDurationII: Stay underwater for up to 3 minutes.
Stay underwater for up to 4 minutes.
upgrade.elementals.waterHelmetDurationIV: Stay underwater for up to 5 minutes.
upgrade.elementals.waterHelmetMastery.de: Allows you to stay underwater indefinitely!
upgrade.elementals.waterHelmetStealth.de: By using refraction, you can make it so you are invisible while using water helmet and barely moving.
upgrade.elementals.waterSuffocate.descri: By taking water and forcing it on the head of a living being, you can drown them even on land.
upgrade.elementals.waterSuffocate.use: Use: sneak while looking at enemy
upgrade.elementals.waterSuffocateRange.d: Reach mobs for up to 15 blocks away.
upgrade.elementals.waterShieldSuffocateP: By rapidly spinning streams of water around you, you can deflect any projectile or enemy coming your way.
upgrade.elementals.waterShieldHelmetPath: By rapidly spinning streams of water around you, you can deflect any projectile or enemy coming your way.
upgrade.elementals.waterArc.description: A sweeping arc of water that can knock back enemies and damage them from a distance.
upgrade.elementals.waterArcDamageI.descr: Allows you to deal a little bit more damage.
upgrade.elementals.waterArcEfficiencyI.d: Use 25% less chi when casting water arc.
upgrade.elementals.waterArcSpeedI.descri: Make water arc faster, allowing you to get more range
upgrade.elementals.waterArcSpeedII.descr: Make water arc even faster, allowing you to get more range
upgrade.elementals.waterArcMastery.descr: Mastery of the water arc ability allows you to deal more damage.
upgrade.elementals.waterJet.description: A concentrated stream of water that can be used to push objects or attack enemies.
upgrade.elementals.waterJetDamageI.descr: Allows you to deal a little bit more damage.
upgrade.elementals.waterJetRangeI.descri: Reach mobs for up to 15 blocks away.
upgrade.elementals.waterBlade.descriptio: A sharp blade formed from water, capable of cutting through most materials.
upgrade.elementals.waterBladeDamageI.des: Allows you to deal a little bit more damage.
upgrade.elementals.waterBladeMiningI.des: Water blade will mine a bit faster.
upgrade.elementals.waterBladeMiningII.de: Water blade will mine even faster.
upgrade.elementals.waterBladeSpeedI.desc: Make water blade faster, allowing you to get more range
upgrade.elementals.waterBladeSpeedII.des: Make water blade even faster, allowing you to get more range
upgrade.elementals.waterCannon.descripti: A powerful blast of water that can knock back enemies and break through obstacles.
upgrade.elementals.waterCannonRangeI.des: Reach mobs for up to 15 blocks away.
upgrade.elementals.waterCannonDamageI.de: Allows you to deal a little bit more damage.
upgrade.elementals.waterJump.description: Use a burst of water to propel yourself high into the air.
upgrade.elementals.waterTower.descriptio: Create a towering column of water to elevate yourself.
upgrade.elementals.waterTower.use: Use: not touching ground + water below
upgrade.elementals.waterTowerRangeI.desc: Make a taller column of water.
upgrade.elementals.waterSurf.description: Ride a wave of water to move swiftly across water.
upgrade.elementals.waterSurf.use: Use: sprint + touch ground or submerged in water
upgrade.elementals.waterPickupEfficiency: Get water from more diverse sources.
upgrade.elementals.waterHealing.descript: Using water to direct the flow of chi, it is possible to heal allies.
upgrade.elementals.waterHealingEfficienc: Water healing is even more potent.
upgrade.elementals.fireIgnition.descript: A basic move allowing you to set the ground on fire or fuel furnaces.
upgrade.elementals.fireFlareUp.descripti: Upgrade your Ignition ability to be even more powerful.
upgrade.elementals.blueFire.description: By more effectively controlling your fire, you can make your abilities burn hotter, giving them a blue hue.
upgrade.elementals.fireWall.description: Allows you to close off areas using fire, mostly effective defensively.
upgrade.elementals.fireWallWideI.descrip: Your walls of fire are wider.
upgrade.elementals.fireWallTallI.descrip: Your walls of fire are taller.
upgrade.elementals.fireSpikesCountI.desc: Increases the amount of fire spikes spawned.
upgrade.elementals.fireSpikesRangeI.desc: Increases the amount of fire spikes spawned.
upgrade.elementals.fireArc.description: A sweeping arc of fire that can knock back enemies, set them on fire and damage them from a distance.
upgrade.elementals.fireArcDamageI.descri: Deal more damage using fire arc.
upgrade.elementals.fireArcEfficiencyI.de: Use 25% less chi when casting fire arc.
upgrade.elementals.fireArcSpeedI.descrip: Make fire arc faster, allowing you to get more range
upgrade.elementals.fireArcSpeedII.descri: Make fire arc even faster, allowing you to get more range
upgrade.elementals.fireArcMastery.descri: Mastery of the fire arc ability allows you to deal more damage.
upgrade.elementals.fireBall.description: By compressing a lot of fire in a tight space, you can create a fireball with devastating power.
upgrade.elementals.fireBallSpeedI.descri: Make fireball faster, allowing you to get more range
upgrade.elementals.fireBallSpeedII.descr: Make fireball even faster, allowing you to get more range
upgrade.elementals.flameThrower.descript: Makes a stream of fire to incinerate enemies in front of you.
upgrade.elementals.fireShield.descriptio: By rapidly spinning fire around you, you can incinerate any projectile or enemy coming your way.
upgrade.elementals.fireJump.description: Use a burst of fire to propel yourself high into the air.
upgrade.elementals.fireJet.description: Generate a powerful jet of fire to enable you to fly.
upgrade.elementals.fireJetSpeedI.descrip: Allows you to fly faster using the jet ability.
upgrade.elementals.fireJetSpeedII.descri: Allows you to fly even faster using the jet ability.
